Necross/ Splattercannon/ Sweeps:
 
Necross prepared to fire another volley when Blackfang opened fire.  Necross shielded his optics as Splattercannon came to his aid, opening fire on Blackfang.  A Sweep helped Necross away for the moment so the minion could recover while Splattercannon bought him time.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Rodimus/BlackFang:

Rodimus a drop of acyd reached ROdimus in his arm, he fell wouded and wsitha terribly pain, but he didn't like surrender... he had to protect his fellows, his base and most important his family. BlackFang Shouted furious and opended fire against Necross.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
Necross/ ????:
  
Necross landed and transformed back into robot mode.  His puncture wounds had mostly recovered by now, but his energy reserve was noticably affected.  This enraged him, no opponent had ever dropped his power by such a degree, and this would be the last time.  He opened fire with both his weapons, acid blaster on Rodimus and missile blaster on Cryaltron.
  
Then, the sixth minion of Unicron decended, with a few of her Sweeps in tow.  The Sweep commander landed and looked over the battles in progress.  Her interest was perticularly drawn to the fight between Malice and Nightstrike.  She took a step closer and watched he two fight in interest, while the Sweeps went to aid the other minions.
		
---------------------------------
